title: Zed has a stun?
body:
>game_buff_tooltip_ZedStun

=====================
>Schadenfreude
>The next champion that takes more than 20% of its current Health in one strike or spell from Zed will be stunned.
>Source: SummonerName (Zed)

What is this? Found in the text files of the game.

replies.body: death is a rather long stun
but it also makes you untargettable and warps you back to spawn. totally OP

{{champion:238}} : I am the healthiest assassin and am completely balanced.

Everyone else: O.O 

That is his stun in action.
it could be something with the new assassin update
Probably just something from an old version of Zed and was left in the game files.

Thats actually a very interesting ability since its so useless on tanky characters.  If it is in the game as part of the assassin rework I'd wager its going to be a replacement for his current passive.  Way to bring QSS back as something to buy vs Zed XP

Wouldn't it work on tanks who are low on health?

I suppose the stun could be used to finish off targets who are low on HP and to assassinate squishy champs.

Sorry, was thinking more along the lines of being able to proc it during an even teamfight.  Something along the lines of both teams gathering for a dragon or such.

On that note however wouldn't the stun be a waste on the tank if you have to get him to half health or less anyway?  Having the stun set off more easily for softer characters that Zed would want to be fighting anyway just makes more sense.  A change like that actually makes me curious to see if the stormraiders mastery would look better on him than thunderlords.
This might have something to do with the Assassin Roster Update coming after Yoricks rework. Zed is already really hard to deal with. I cant imagine him with a stun...
IT's probably gonna be implemented in the assassin update, so we should see it soon.
